articles.author: Yashraj Sharma
articles.title: Putin visits India amid Ukraine peace push: What’s on the agenda? - Al Jazeera
articles.description: President Putin visits India as Russia faces pressure to end war in Ukraine, looking to boost bilateral trade deals.
articles.content: New Delhi, India Russian President Vladimir Putin landed in the Indian capital on Thursday evening for his first visit to the country since Moscow launched a full-scale invasion of Ukraine nearly fou… [+11618 chars]

articles.author: Chidanand Rajghatta
articles.title: Kill Baby Kill: Trump rolls back US fuel economy standards calling it 'green new scam' - Times of India
articles.description: US News: US President Donald Trump announced a significant rollback of fuel-economy standards, lowering targets from 50.4 mpg to 34.5 mpg. This decision effect
